review: Movie was awesome, hero played as natural as one can be with his matured acting, we feel like its not his debut film. Movie is a mixture of all which one could expect and conveyed the content it has, in a excellent manner. RR gives you butterflies in some scenes and took the film to next level. Srikanth acting was the best. Songs were enjoyable. All credits goes to the cast and crew. A new concept which is far better than an regular films.Its a must watch film
